name: recom
description: A template for an e-commerce application/website, made with React!

scripts.ins: npm install && (cd ./server && npm install) && cd .. && (cd ./client && npm install) && cd .. && (cd ./admin && npm install)
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server-dev" "npm run client-dev" " npm run admin-dev " " npm run mongo"
scripts.admin-dev: cd ./admin && cross-env REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL=http://localhost:4000 BROWSER=none PORT=3050 npm start
scripts.server-dev: cd ./server && cross-env JWT_SECRET=abc DB_URI="mongodb://the_username:the_password@localhost:27017/store" npm run dev

author: ronituohino
